question: Which social media giant has delayed the implementation of a new privacy policy by 3 months?
explanation:
The Facebook owned social communication giant “WhatsApp” has announced that, the implementation of its new privacy policy has been delayed by 3 months. The privacy policy was to originally come into force on Feb 8, 2021.
The new privacy policy has come under severe criticism from public and has led to massive migration of users from WhatsApp to other platforms like Signal and Telegram.
